sentences.en: After the war, The House of Hardie came near to bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 战后，哈迪家族濒于破产。

sentences.en: Bankruptcy was the blight of the family.
His firm is just on thin ice of bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 他的商号正面临破产的危险.

sentences.en: His misfortunes culminated in his bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 他的厄运达到了顶点,终于破产.

sentences.en: In 1999 it was revealed that he was close to bankruptcy.
She dared the danger of bankruptcy.
She is credited with having saved the company from bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 公司免于破产,大家认为是她的功劳.

sentences.en: The company is on the brink of bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 该公司已濒临于破产的边缘.

sentences.en: The firm will head toward bankruptcy unless a new manager is elected.
sentences.cn: 如果再不选出新的经理,这个公司就会破产.

sentences.en: The recession and hospital bills drove them into bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 经济衰退和医疗账单逼得他们破产了。

sentences.en: The threat of bankruptcy hung over the company.
sentences.cn: 那家公司出现了破产的预兆.

sentences.en: The tycoon is on the verge of bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 那名大亨濒临破产的边缘.

sentences.en: Their profligate lifestyle resulted in bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 他们挥霍的生活方式导致的破产.

sentences.en: Three of the hotels are in receivership, and others are teetering on the brink of bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 有3家宾馆已破产在管，其他几家正在破产的边缘徘徊。

sentences.en: We capitalised our assets to avoid bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 我们把资产转作资金以避免破产.

sentences.en: When inflation rises, so do bankruptcies.
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀加剧，破产个案也会增加。

sentences.en: You will have to pull in if you want to escape bankruptcy.
sentences.cn: 如果你想避免破产,就必须节省开支.
